short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is chrome extension for healthez.care. It facilitates adding patient's data, showing device data and generating orders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kare Health chrome extension enables users to upload patient data to healthez portal, shows patient's vitals and helps create new order for devices. It reduces efforts to go to the portal and add patient's entries manually.
